version_description:
- Create Your Own From Scratch
- Added grid lines for better alignments in editor
- Auto save your designed cards

Added new features such as multiple layers for stickers, change the color of stickers, handle for zoom and alignments.
Bug Fixes
Performance Improvements

iOS 12 Library Update,
Bug Resolution,
New Features Added

1. Bug Resolutions & Performance Improvements
2. Duplicate text & sticker functionality added

• New: Post multiple images in a single post on Facebook pages.
• Performance improvement.
• Minor bug fixes.

- Added a new option to apply dark appearance.
- Turn it on under Settings -> Display & Brightness -> Dark Mode.

Also, Important bug fixes and greatly improved the app performances!!

Just update and try it!
